bibl.title: The Herakleopolite Nome. A Catalogue of the Toponyms, with Introduction and Commentary. (American Studies in Papyrology. 37.)
bibl.note: 1 carte dépl. (75,5 cm x 51,5) sous pochette.

Part One. Introduction (1. In insula Nili; - 2. Toparchies and Pagi; - 3. Documents mentioning Herakleopolite Toponyms: Time-distribution, Provenance and Contents). - Part Two. The Toponyms of the Herakleopolite Nome. - Indexes.
FALIVENE Maria Rosaria, The Herakleopolite Nome. A Catalogue of the Toponyms, with Introduction and Commentary. (American Studies in Papyrology. 37.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1998, 4°, xvii-324 pp., 1 carte dépl. (75,5 cm x 51,5) sous pochette. ISBN 0-7885-0412-6. $59.95.
